attributes.action: Increase ALL Unemployed Benefits, by the extra £20 weekly Covid-19 uplift relief
attributes.additional_details:
Please Pay Immediately, with backpaying the £20 increase, and compensation for Hardship endured because of Government Wrongs.

Through ZERO Fault of their own, many Unemployed CLAIMANTS got ZERO (0) uplift increase. Only Universal Credit claimants get the extra £20 week.

There's significant hardship, and Grave Mental Health issues occurring now or in the future.

IT’S HARD TO BUDGET Unemployment Benefit, & 'Keeping COVID Safe', by keeping windows open for ventilation in the cold is extra costs.
attributes.background:
We want the Government to Urgently pay the £20 COVID-19 increase to ALL Unemployed benefit recipients who NEVER received it - like 'JSA Claimants'. 

Please Pay Properly, to All unemployed claimants, NOT just those on Universal Credit.

Pay A) Immediately  B) with backpay & C) with compensation.
